txt.en: 'Raphûz suggests a celebration for all of us. A meal, a smoke, and talk of the future.\n\n'I hope you will join us.'
Ashâmi and Raphûz ask you to share their time by a fire in Shonith to discuss the trials of the past several days.

'We talked late into the night, my friend, long after you departed. Ashâmi convinced me our destinies lie east, toward Kûr Anzar.

'There is a warrior there, said to be a hero reborn. She fights for the future of this land.

'Since my arrival in Shagâna, this is the call I have heard. I have found my path. Now, I must walk it.

'Thank you for all your help along the way. I hope to see you again.'
'We will be here this evening if you wish to join us. Please do.'
Raphûz and Ashâmi invited you to sit with them to discuss the events of your arrival in Shonith and the future.
You allowed Raphûz and Ashâmi to speak without you at the advice of Lathagwid. You should return to Raphûz at the oasis Shonith to learn how the remainder of the night went.
